content.detail:
(sqlite3.OperationalError) disk I/O error
[SQL: SELECT users.id AS users_id, users.name AS users_name, users.phone AS users_phone, users.password_hash AS users_password_hash, users.role AS users_role, users.created_at AS users_created_at 
FROM users 
WHERE users.phone = ?
 LIMIT ? OFFSET ?]
[parameters: ('0987654321', 1, 0)]
(Background on this error at: https://sqlalche.me/e/20/e3q8)
